title: P2P Advertiser Statistics (response)
description: Returns historical trade statistics of a P2P advertiser.

buy_orders_count.description: The number of buy order completed within the requested time period.

cancel_time_avg.description: The average time taken to cancel orders as a buyer within the requested time period, in seconds.

completion_rate.description: The percentage of completed orders out of total orders as a buyer within the requested time period.

release_time_avg.description: The average time taken to release funds as a seller within the requested time period, in seconds.

sell_orders_count.description: The number of bselluy order orders completed within the requested time period.

total_orders_count.description: The total number of orders created since advertiser registration.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
